temple.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a building where people go to worship, in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions
temple.translation[0].definitions[1].def: one of the two fairly flat areas on each side of your forehead
temple.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an area in central London which contains the Inner Temple and the Middle Temple, two parts of the Inns of Court. Many lawyers and barristers work there.
